name: Новость Crocus Group 1 Новость Crocus Group 1
preview: Don’t wait. The purpose of our lives is to be happy! Don’t wait. The purpose of our lives is to be happy! Don’t wait. The purpose of our lives is to be happy! Don’t wait. The purpose of our lives is to be happy!
text: Upon arrival, your senses will be rewarded with the pleasant scent of lemongrass oil used to clean the natural wood found throughout the room, creating a relaxing atmosphere within the space. A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite.
